instructions:
Call Summarization 2

For this test, you will need to listen to information that is provided to you through the computer. We recommend using a headset or a set of quality speakers. You may write notes about each of the stories in the box in the lower half of the screen labeled Notes to help you recall information about the story.

After each story has been told, follow the on-screen instructions to proceed to a question where you will be asked to choose the alternative that best summarizes that story.

The information you record in any of the boxes on the screen will later be available to assist you in choosing the correct answer.

HOW TO RESPOND TO MULTIPLE-CHOICE QUESTION

With each question there will be four choices labeled A, B, C, and D. You can choose your response in one of three ways.

  1. You can use your mouse to select your answers
  2. You can use the up and down arrows to choose your response.
  3. You can hold down the Alt key and then press either A, B, C, or D.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, while they were at the store one of the men bought:
The name of the movie theater where the men wanted the caller to meet them was the _______ cinema.
The caller described herself as ____________ of the liquor store:
The vehicle that the men drove away in was described by the caller as being a _________truck.
One of the men left his __________ behind at the store.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: Man reports seeing flames coming out of hotel's windows.

mcqQuestions.questionText: The residents of the house where the suspicious activity is taking place were last seen leaving the house on:
The caller described the suspicious person's vehicle as being colored _________ stripes painted on its sides.
The age of the suspicious person was estimated by the caller to be __________ years old.
The suspicious person is said to have _________ hair.
The suspicious person was last seen by the caller:

options.text: In the back yard of the house next door to 1461 Cedar.
In the back yard of the house across the street from 1461 Cedar.
In the back yard of the house next door to 1484 Cedar.
In a vehicle in front of 1484 Cedar.

emergencyQuestions.questionText: The sewer pipe to a house on Watkins Street is broken.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, the accident happened __________ prior to his calling this report in.
According to the caller, the number and gender of the occupants of the vehicle was:
The vehicle involved in the accident was described as a:
The caller said that he saw the vehicle involved in the accident:

options.text: Fail to yield the right of way.

mcqQuestions.questionText: According to the caller, he saw _________ bleeding after the accident occurred.

options.text: Both the driver and the passenger.
Both the driver and the person in the rear seat.

captions.CS121:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.120 --> 00:00:02.390
Hi. My name is Shannan white.

2
00:00:02.520 --> 00:00:10.145
Shannan S H A N N A N White W H I T E

6
00:00:10.650 --> 00:00:12.320
you know like the color white.

7
00:00:12.810 --> 00:00:14.820
I am the manager of the liquor store
at

8
00:00:14.821 --> 00:00:16.739
7 3 4 4

9
00:00:16.740 --> 00:00:20.480
Maple M A P L E

11
00:00:20.790 --> 00:00:22.020
N Southvale

12
00:00:22.620 --> 00:00:26.460
S O U T H V A L E.

14
00:00:26.930 --> 00:00:28.490
I am really angry.

15
00:00:28.740 --> 00:00:29.910
I tried calling the owner

16
00:00:29.911 --> 00:00:31.820
but his wife said he wasn't home.

17
00:00:32.130 --> 00:00:33.830
There were two guys here you know.

18
00:00:33.990 --> 00:00:35.600
They came in to buy pretzels.

19
00:00:36.000 --> 00:00:38.180
Boy were they high on something you
know.

20
00:00:38.340 --> 00:00:39.420
They paid for the pretzels

21
00:00:39.421 --> 00:00:40.520
with a credit card.

22
00:00:40.800 --> 00:00:42.629
I told them I couldn't take credit
cards

23
00:00:42.630 --> 00:00:44.750
unless they had a current driver's
license

24
00:00:44.940 --> 00:00:46.019
but they got so mad

25
00:00:46.020 --> 00:00:47.850
and the guy with the Credit Card
said he

26
00:00:47.851 --> 00:00:49.680
only had an expired driver's license

27
00:00:49.681 --> 00:00:51.560
so I took the credit card anyway

28
00:00:51.900 --> 00:00:53.730
but I wrote down the guy's license
plate

29
00:00:53.731 --> 00:00:56.060
number that was on his flatbed
truck.

30
00:00:56.400 --> 00:01:00.590
It is 7 X P R 8 4 2.

32
00:01:01.170 --> 00:01:03.060
They even asked me to meet them at
the

33
00:01:03.061 --> 00:01:05.129
9 o'clock movie at the Playland

34
00:01:05.130 --> 00:01:07.190
cinema after I got off work.

35
00:01:07.800 --> 00:01:09.990
Look they just left as they were
driving

36
00:01:09.991 --> 00:01:12.389
away. They almost ran headfirst

37
00:01:12.390 --> 00:01:13.580
into a red car

38
00:01:13.650 --> 00:01:15.380
with their metallic blue truck.

39
00:01:15.900 --> 00:01:18.140
I am afraid they are going to hurt
somebody.

40
00:01:18.330 --> 00:01:20.280
Oh yeah the stupid guy left his

41
00:01:20.281 --> 00:01:21.850
driver's license behind.

42
00:01:22.230 --> 00:01:27.470
Its number is R 4 5 8 3 4 9 7.
captions.CS122:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.090 --> 00:00:02.340
Hi. This is Sally Stone again.

2
00:00:02.520 --> 00:00:04.980
Sally S A L L Y.

4
00:00:05.550 --> 00:00:08.243
Stone S T O N E.

6
00:00:08.880 --> 00:00:10.910
I know you guys are glad to hear
from me.

7
00:00:11.040 --> 00:00:12.900
My husband says I should write a
book about

8
00:00:12.901 --> 00:00:14.120
all the stuff I see.

9
00:00:14.460 --> 00:00:19.977
I live at 1 4 6 1 Cedar C E D A R

12
00:00:20.490 --> 00:00:21.890
in valley stream.

13
00:00:22.050 --> 00:00:25.220
Valley V A L L E Y.

15
00:00:25.380 --> 00:00:28.540
Stream S T R E A M.

17
00:00:29.190 --> 00:00:31.049
My neighbors in the house next door

18
00:00:31.050 --> 00:00:32.120
on vacation.

19
00:00:32.369 --> 00:00:33.630
I saw them leave Tuesday

20
00:00:33.631 --> 00:00:34.760
with suitcases.

21
00:00:35.010 --> 00:00:36.530
There should be no one home.

22
00:00:36.920 --> 00:00:39.240
There is this vehicle a suspicious

23
00:00:39.241 --> 00:00:41.190
guy with long frizzy blond hair

24
00:00:41.191 --> 00:00:42.720
hanging around in the backyard.

25
00:00:43.290 --> 00:00:45.320
I know it's not my neighbors because

26
00:00:45.420 --> 00:00:47.340
they bought their house about the
same time as

27
00:00:47.341 --> 00:00:48.740
me 10 years ago

28
00:00:48.780 --> 00:00:50.610
and their 10 year old kids look
about 10

29
00:00:50.611 --> 00:00:52.010
years younger than this guy

30
00:00:52.290 --> 00:00:54.290
and their kids get short brown hair.

31
00:00:54.480 --> 00:00:55.190
Oh yeah.

32
00:00:55.290 --> 00:00:56.759
You already have my phone number.

33
00:00:56.760 --> 00:01:01.520
But here it is again 6 4 9 8 7 2 4.

36
00:01:02.190 --> 00:01:04.040
I know last time I called you guys

37
00:01:04.110 --> 00:01:06.209
that it turned out to be something
really big

38
00:01:06.210 --> 00:01:07.760
a kidnapping or something.

39
00:01:08.010 --> 00:01:09.390
Maybe it's nothing this time

40
00:01:09.391 --> 00:01:11.180
but maybe it's something important.

41
00:01:11.490 --> 00:01:13.530
It's just that I know that this guy
doesn't

42
00:01:13.531 --> 00:01:15.660
belong in this neighborhood
especially

43
00:01:15.661 --> 00:01:17.370
with that ratty old green truck

44
00:01:17.371 --> 00:01:19.139
with the yellow stripes painted on
the side.

45
00:01:19.140 --> 00:01:21.120
I saw him Parkdale in front of 14

46
00:01:21.121 --> 00:01:22.211
84 Cedar.

47
00:01:23.190 --> 00:01:25.470
I saw the guy drop his vehicle
registration

48
00:01:25.471 --> 00:01:27.419
form and I have his VIN number

49
00:01:27.420 --> 00:01:27.908
here.

50
00:01:28.380 --> 00:01:38.056
It is I M L P 6 0 2 1 V 6 9 4 3 8 G T.

55
00:01:38.970 --> 00:01:41.460
Maybe you could check this guy out
as soon as
captions.CS123:
WEBVTT

1
00:00:00.300 --> 00:00:01.789
My name is Michael Lopez

2
00:00:01.790 --> 00:00:06.785
and M I C H A E L L O P E S.

5
00:00:07.950 --> 00:00:09.780
I'm calling for my house in the city
of

6
00:00:09.781 --> 00:00:11.729
Harley H A R L E Y where I live

8
00:00:13.771 --> 00:00:20.036
at 5 9 2 4 1 Master M A S T E R.

11
00:00:20.490 --> 00:00:22.158
Have you had any reports of an
accident?

12
00:00:22.470 --> 00:00:24.680
How come you guys didn't show up
when it happened?

13
00:00:25.040 --> 00:00:26.940
See I was at the carwash on E

14
00:00:26.941 --> 00:00:28.940
Street vacuuming out my Chevrolet.

15
00:00:28.960 --> 00:00:30.599
You know the car wash on each
street.

16
00:00:30.600 --> 00:00:32.430
Not the one on Hawthorne Street.

17
00:00:32.820 --> 00:00:34.650
Anyway I saw a green

18
00:00:34.651 --> 00:00:36.470
Pontiac run a stop sign

19
00:00:36.590 --> 00:00:38.600
and swerve right into a fire
hydrant.

20
00:00:38.910 --> 00:00:40.700
It all happened about 20 minutes
ago.

21
00:00:41.280 --> 00:00:42.890
The car's license plate was

22
00:00:43.170 --> 00:00:47.690
8 4 9 8 Q N T.

24
00:00:48.210 --> 00:00:50.180
The driver of the car seemed to be
OK

25
00:00:50.520 --> 00:00:52.380
but I don't think she's all there if
you know what

26
00:00:52.381 --> 00:00:52.940
I mean.

27
00:00:53.610 --> 00:00:54.750
I think she is drugged out

28
00:00:54.751 --> 00:00:57.130
or something because she kept
talking to herself.

29
00:00:57.630 --> 00:00:59.550
She must have been wearing her
seatbelt because

30
00:00:59.551 --> 00:01:01.499
she is the only one in the car

31
00:01:01.500 --> 00:01:03.689
who wasn't hurt her friend

32
00:01:03.690 --> 00:01:05.759
in the passenger seat wasn't quite

33
00:01:05.760 --> 00:01:06.500
so lucky.

34
00:01:06.720 --> 00:01:08.670
He must have been bounced around
quite a bit since

35
00:01:08.671 --> 00:01:10.010
he seemed to be cut everywhere.

36
00:01:10.470 --> 00:01:11.870
There was blood everywhere.

37
00:01:12.480 --> 00:01:13.649
I felt sorry for him

38
00:01:13.650 --> 00:01:15.640
but he kept telling me he didn't
want any help.

39
00:01:15.790 --> 00:01:17.790
And the guy in the backseat looked
really pale

40
00:01:17.791 --> 00:01:19.950
like he smacked his head on
something because

41
00:01:19.951 --> 00:01:21.230
it was all bruised up.

42
00:01:21.510 --> 00:01:23.370
He kept saying he didn't want his
parents to find

43
00:01:23.371 --> 00:01:24.450
out that the car was wrecked

44
00:01:24.451 --> 00:01:26.090
and that it was all his brother's
fault.

45
00:01:26.730 --> 00:01:28.830
If you need to call me back my
telephone number

46
00:01:28.831 --> 00:01:32.180
is 7 4 0 8 7 2 3.

48
00:01:32.550 --> 00:01:33.420
Where were you guys?

49
00:01:33.720 --> 00:01:34.850
Why didn't you come help them?
